snippet: Making “Chasing Ice,” about a photographer documenting receding glaciers, Jeff Orlowski learned what cold really meant.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with filmmaker Jeff Orlowski about his documentary Chasing Ice, which follows photographer James Balog around the arctic as he documents glaciers.
lead_paragraph: Making “Chasing Ice,” about a photographer documenting receding glaciers, Jeff Orlowski learned what cold really meant.

headline.seo: Talking With Jeff Orlowski About ‘Chasing Ice’
headline.main: What to Expect When You’re Shooting Glaciers
headline.print_headline: What to Expect When You’re Shooting Glaciers
